actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

official_title: To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate certain segments of the Farmington River and Salmon Brook in the State of Connecticut as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.
short_title: Lower Farmington River and Salmon Brook Wild and Scenic River Act
subjects: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

titles.title: Lower Farmington River and Salmon Brook Wild and Scenic River Act

To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate certain segments of the Farmington River and Salmon Brook in the State of Connecticut as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.
